content: 15 knit till last 3 sts p1 sl3wyif turn 1 st decreased sl2wyif turn row 6 knit till last 2 sts sl2wyif row 16 c4f sl3wyif turn turn row 17 same as row 11 repeat row 1 & 2 once more repeat row 1 once more row 10 knit till last 3 sts p1 sl2wyif turn increasing wedges row 11 c4f knit till last 3 sts sl3wyif turn row 1 knit till last 3 sts sl3wyif row 12 same as row 2 turn repeat row 1 12 eighteen more row 2 knit till last 2 sts sl2wyif times turn repeat row 1 & 2 once more row 5 k2 k1fb knit till last 3 sts sl3wyif turn 1 st increased caro in the city @ 2025 page 4 last wedge row 1 knit till last 3 sts sl3wyif tip turn row 2 knit till last 2 sts sl2wyif turn repeat row 1 & 2 once more row 5 k2 k2tog sl3wyif turn 1 st decreased with 6 sts remaining row 6 knit till last 2 sts sl2wyif turn repeat row 1 & 2 once more repeat row 1 once more row 10 knit all sts 6 sts divide stitches into 2 groups of three with three stitches on each needle break yarn thread yarn onto darning needle using kitchener stitch graft stitches together finishing weave in ends steam gently enjoy caro in the city © 2025 page 5 guide to abbreviations term definition co cast on with cable needle slip 2 stitches to cable needle hold in front k2 from left-hand needle then k2 from cable needle c4f see video link on next page for instructions on c4f without a cable needle k knit k1fb knit into front and back of same stitch one stitch increased k2tog knit 2 stitches together one stitch decreased p purl pu pick up a stitch without knitting it pu&k pick up a stitch and knit it slwyif slip the stated number of stitches purlwise with yarn in front st s stitch es wyif with yarn in front yf bring yarn to side of work facing you caro in the city © 2025 page 6 links to tutorials term tutorial long-tail
